availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Hopkinsville post office, Christian County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born farmer. Son of James Witty and Lucinda Coon. Married Agnes I.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, Hopkinsville post office, p. 69.

Find A Grave, Entry for George Washington Witty (1837-1911), Find A Grave Memorial # 114724157, Milburn Cemetery, Milburn, Carlisle County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=witty&GSfn=george&GSbyrel=all&GSdy=1911&GSdyrel=in&GSob=n&GRid=114724157&df=all& (accessed 26 July 2017).
